articles.title: A nearby dark molecular cloud in the Local Bubble revealed via H - Nature
articles.description: Eos is a newly discovered molecular cloud sitting just 94 pc from the Sun. It was detected through the far-UV emission of its molecular hydrogen, having been missed in conventional molecular gas surveys due to a low abundance of common gas tracers.
